resources.string: SunRise, a quick get away from the chaos of city.Located 25 kms from Shimla ,in the lap of The Himalayas gives you a unique experience of modern day vacation home.

SunRise, a quick getaway from the chaos of city.Located 25kms from Shimla , in the lap of The Himalayas gives you a taste of modern day vacation home.Equiped with latest facilites we ensure that you will have one of the best moments of your life here.

Lost somewhere in the woods lies ones true self.Discover yourself at INTO THE WOODS, our premiere TREEHOUSE.Located 5kms from Manali at 21000 m above sea level in the magestic snowcapped forests of Himachal lies a cottage full of warmth.

Experience the lavish lifestyle of a Maharani at RANI MAHAL, the queen\'s palace situated in the lush green valleys of Aravali Hills.The palace offers 10 luxury suites, being lived once by the queens of Maharana Jagat Singh of Mewar.Each suite consists of a living room,bedroom and a luxury bathroom.
Also Known by it\'s nickname , Palace of Dreams,The Nizam\'s Palace will certainly take you into one.It has 15 premiere suites each being unique in itself.

Lake Palace is one the most romantic places on earth.The Palace situated amidst the scenic Pichola Lake offers a heavenly look to the onlooker.The imposing Aravalli Hills on one side and soaring palaces on the other, make the perfect background to this beautiful palace.
